oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On-farm soil quality estimations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Palojärvi, Ansa
Myllys, Merja
Alakukku, Laura
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soil quality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The study aims to develop a battery of on-farm soil quality tests for use in both organic and conventional farming. The work is largely based on available on-farm test systems.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Palojärvi, Ansa; Myllys, Merja and Alakukku, Laura (2003) On-farm soil quality estimations. Poster at: NJF's 22nd congress "Nordic agriculture in global perspective", Turku, Finland, July 1-4, 2003.
